snippet: Before a 22-year-old from Uzbekistan living in Alabama was sentenced to more than 15 years for plotting to kill President Obama, his lawyer called him "a victim to a degree of social media."
abstract: Before a 22-year-old from Uzbekistan living in Alabama was sentenced to more than 15 years for plotting to kill President Obama, his lawyer called him "a victim to a degree of social media."

headline.main: Alabama Uzbek Who Plotted to Kill Obama Was Victim of Social Media, His Lawyer Says
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Uzbek Gets 15 Years In Plot To Kill Obama
